name: Translate Selection
description: Translate selected text to any language. Select text first, then say 'Translate selection to [language] language'.
instructions:
Get your OpenAI API key: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

Usage:
1. Select text in any application
2. Say 'Translate selection to Spanish language'
3. The translated text will be pasted

The prompt uses {language} placeholder.

settings.default: Translate the following text to {language}. Output only the translation, nothing else.
